title: December Nutcracker Trading Competition
description: Join Panoptic's December Nutcracker perpetual options trading competition by claiming, depositing, and trading free tokens daily for a chance to win exciting mystery prizes.

title: Introduction to Synthetic Perpetual Futures
description: In this series, we embark on an in-depth exploration of perps (perpetual futures) and their unique implementation within the Panoptic options trading protocol

title: Buying Power, Collateral, and Leverage
description: Explore how buying power and collateral shape capital efficiency and leverage for perpetual options trading on Panoptic.

title: Beta Launch: Epoch 4
description: Join Epoch 4 of Panoptic's Beta Launch, an expanded DeFi options trading competition with a new chain, more markets, and more prizes!
